title: Poster, "Alfa Romero", ca. 1975
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted in white upper right: 1 24.4" (62cm) / 2  34.3" (87cm) / 3  18.5" (47cm) / 4  18.9" (48cm) / 5  5.6" (14cm) / 6  37.4" (95cm) / 7   55.5" (141cm) / 8  36.2" (92cm) / 9  20.5" (52cm) / 10  18.5" (47cm) / 11  19.7" (50cm) / 12  11.6" (29.5cm) / 13  8.2" (21cm) / 14  90.5" (230cm) / 15  159.6" (4060cm) / 1  55,5" (140cm) / 2  70.2" (178cm) / 3  59.2" (150cm) / 4  68.0" (172cm). Imprinted in white lower left: Passenger Compartment.
Three columns of text printed in white:
Entery and Exit [bold]. Because the floor is only / 295mm from the ground, entry and exit of / passengers and
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: On a silver background two section views of an Alfa Romero passanger van, presented from the driver's side, and rear, in green and white lines with black numbers 1 to 15 for side view and 1 to 4 for rear view, that correspond to legend printed in white at right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Alfa Romero", ca. 1975.
ca. 1975. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-251.
